segments.text: I notice the entire setup in this line drawing kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is straight, apron secured around her waist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet runs endlessly, causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The growing puddle threatens to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, through the divided window panes, a path winds through plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden appears so peaceful and untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy is on the edge of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool tilts backward as he grabs cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand fishes inside the jar eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates, her open hand begging for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secretive snacking could lead to a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential mess and injury.
segments.speaker: PAR
